## localNodeEnvironmentInitializer variable

when running the engine application, an active environment should be provided to this runtime, with the id [LOCAL_ENVIRONMENT_INITIALIZER_ENV_ID](./engine-core-node.local_environment_initializer_env_id.md) when running engine application using \[@<!-- -->wixc3/engineer\](../../engineer), it is done in the node environments manager

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
localNodeEnvironmentInitializer: ({
  communication: com,
  env,
}: InitializerOptions) => {
  id: string;
};
```
